column3: “Not unlike a hit of caffeine from coffee. Speediness in the body expressed through physical energy and a desire to move. Turbos you up up to 10. Mind is noticeably disabled. Higher thinking is tamped out forcing you to relax and not think much. Would be a challenge at work or any situation where you have to recall things. You’d be left grasping for too long. The positive side effect is it spaces you the fuck out! Ser...”
“I'm not gonna lie, I feel stress free right now”

“Super strong, very caked" with kief. rolled 1/8th into joint a and filled up my entire kief chamber. Definelty potent though. I've never smoked a Sativa that gives me couch lock/space out hella but this strain does.”"
“If your tolerance is high and you want a good Sativa to keep you energetic yet mentally euphoric and relaxed go for this beautiful frosty bud”

“Whoa.. wasn’t expecting that. After making it through about a third of joint I felt a rush grab me by the chest then made its way to my head and stayed there... for like 2 1/2 hours I didn’t move. Spun. I also got the dizzy side effects as mentioned in other posts. It fades after about 20-30 min. And leaves you on the moon. Weeeeee”

“The caffeine kick out of this is great! This definitely got me going/put me in a great mood. When I was busy I didnt notice the hunger. I would have some cake then run or cycle. Love this strain. For me it didnt subside pain enough but it is still one of my top favs.”
“It's a great strain, I'm more of an indica guy myself but this had a good taste, and it's pretty strong.”

“This strain is definitely flavorful , I'm using flash wet and the citrus and sweet highlights are obvious before I even spark it . The high is very good euphoric energetic high that allows the user to have the painkiller effects of a indica and the great energy feel of sativa”

“LOVED this strain so much. this is my first review. if you need a strain that's great for morning smoking or smoke a small bowl before you go to something you're nervous about. combatted my anxiety wonderfully, made me feel energetic and creative as all get out. not to mention it smells BOMB. I love lemon, this smells just like lemon cake. highly recommend!!!”

“this is one of my favorite strains, and I have only said that about 3 other times. I didnt expect it to have the very pleasant mild body high it had, and it's actually a pretty great strain for pain relief which was also surprising coming from a sativa. It doesn't impair me, other than making me a tad bit slower" (I prefer "dreamier") depending on dose. I recommend for situations where you want to relax while mainta...”"

“Usually not a huge fan of higher thc Sativa’s but this one is an amazing strain for me! It doesn’t give me the racey high that most do. It was a very well balanced high, able to focus and get things done, be creative but still be relaxed and calm not plagued with anxiety or depression.”

“Delicious, lemony scent with some very potent flavors. Picked up an ounce from a local vendor in Las Vegas and it's been a great daily strain. The high is clear, allows me to enjoy it while still being productive and is wonderful in joints as well.”
“Not bad. Dry mouth by worth it. Focused and up lifted”

“A little goes a long way, but for me, it goes in the right direction. Small hits of this get me through a night shift better than any caffeine. The paranoia was a bit much, but I also felt more in control than usual. I recommend this, but start small!”
“Very pungent cheesy aroma. Tons of trichomes and great flavor. Dense hard nugs too. I'm feeling relaxed”

“Total Active Cannabinoids 21.7%
CBD 0%
THC 20.4%
Terpenes 3.5%

So that's my label. I'm smoking a joint and I hit a couple a bowls on a bong. Very relaxing, yet energetic. The smell is awesome! Lemon more than cheese but the cheesiness lingers. Perfect for a lunch break toke.”

“Delicious, lemony scent with some very potent flavors. Picked up an ounce from a local vendor in Las Vegas and it's been a great daily strain. The high is clear, allows me to enjoy it while still being productive and is wonderful in joints as well.”
“Very pungent cheesy aroma. Tons of trichomes and great flavor. Dense hard nugs too. I'm feeling relaxed”

“A little goes a long way, but for me, it goes in the right direction. Small hits of this get me through a night shift better than any caffeine. The paranoia was a bit much, but I also felt more in control than usual. I recommend this, but start small!”

“this is one of my favorite strains, and I have only said that about 3 other times. I didnt expect it to have the very pleasant mild body high it had, and it's actually a pretty great strain for pain relief which was also surprising coming from a sativa. It doesn't impair me, other than making me a tad bit slower" (I prefer "dreamier") depending on dose. I recommend for situations where you want to relax while mainta...”"

“I hated the ounce I grabbed of this. Hits slow as hell, creates a confusing high that made me want to smoke more. A couch lock sativa that will make you remember every terrible thing in your life. Yikes. Nugs were huge and tied bag made my apartment smell like skunk so it was definitely dank just a strain that didn’t work well with me. I might smoke a gram or two but trying to self medicate was hard on this.”
“Mmmmm not bad the only thing is that it WILL make u so fucking hungry lol just watch out”
“smoke this if you wanna get something done. great for working after 2 solid pipe loads! Nice buds and has a tender taste.”

“What happens when you mix Lemon Skunk and a dangerously potent Cheese?<3 Lemon Cheesecake <3  This fun heady strain is perfect for a relaxing yet productive day, be prepared for the food cravings brought on by the cheesy sent of this fluffy flower.”
“Great high, mild taste, awesome smell. This strain will not let you down. One of my favorite lemon strain”

“Nicely shaped buds, smells like lemon cheesecake and tastes like it in a vaporizer.  I'm not a fan of the cheese flavor although I do enjoy citrus flavors in my cannabis.  It feels slightly sativa dominant with a spacey somewhat cerebral buzz.  Good for stress and getting simple tasks done.”
“It’s a good euphoric high with an intense smell. It got me so high it was a, piece of cake 🤷‍♂️😂”

“A great tasting Sativa packed with a little energy and amazing for killing fatigue. I always keep a little of this around the house when I need it. When a long week is dragging you down, this is the perfect strain to bring you back to baseline. A little boost of energy and focus accompanies the citrus taste. A cerebral high that sets you in your seat and gets you ready to tackle the day. If you are working hard throu...”
“If you’re looking to be stoned, this is it. This sativa made me sit down. I was not able to function like I have been on other sativas I have tried.”
“Absolutely awesome strain! Tastes like pure lemon zest when pressed into rosin. Great yielding plant & super grower friendly.”

“A 5 star FAV for me. It really does taste so good, I am glad i tried this sativa out not disappointed with it at all, feel good and relaxed...pain relief as great as a heavy indica, a must try guys!”
“Definitely a heavy hitter but definitely sativa family!! I'm more or an indica man but good bud”
“One of the best strains. Period.”

“There was a significant delay before the high hit and when it hit it was strong! I thought the high was over but then it lingered for several hours. It was fun and I’ll try it again but hopefully it doesn’t take so long to come back.”

“I definitely do not smoke sativa,but this is one to try,has such a pleasant high,as well as taste,won't leave you to sedated,but really shows it sativa side with a instant cerebral buzz,followed by relaxation,smells of cheesecake”
“So yummy loved this one now I want some real cake lol”

“What happens when you mix Lemon Skunk and a dangerously potent Cheese?<3 Lemon Cheesecake <3  This fun heady strain is perfect for a relaxing yet productive day, be prepared for the food cravings brought on by the cheesy sent of this fluffy flower.”
“smoke this if you wanna get something done. great for working after 2 solid pipe loads! Nice buds and has a tender taste.”

“Musky yet pleasant aroma. Brings summer to mind. Taste is slightly sweet. Effects are lovely. Rose-colored glasses feeling similar to Sour Diesel. Would recommend to patients who are looking for motivational, energetic strains or to help with depression. Nice to have a sativa without the anxiety. Paranoia level: 0/10.”

“Love, Love, Love ❤️❤️❤️❤️
This strain helps with my apitite so much. My anxiety is reduced by 80% and I feel on top of the world. 🌏
Definitely in my top 10✔️
Did I mention how beautiful it looks and amazing it tastes?”
“It tastes wonderful and smells good. It gives a nice buzzy high. These type of highs are best for me, because it helps with positive thinking. So very euphoric.”

“This smells INSANE and for me the buzz starts off very 
chill and relaxing and then slightly energizes after about 30 min.”

“An amazing high, one of the best I've experienced, the one downside is the awful taste. Now this could just be how the weed I got was grown but the general taste should be across the board. Would still recommend to anyone but it's hard to smoke several bowls in a row without the taste getting to you.”

“the taste is on point. upon hitting a Fireline Lemon Cake preroll, I get instant hints of cheese and citrus. this heavy sativa helped me combat stress and anxiety. if you're looking for a strain that tastes amazing and has that heady buzz you get from sativa's, try this one.”

“This strain packs a punch! I really mean that! After smoking one spliff i thought this would be a mild high and nothing special. I was so wrong. Maybe 20 or 30 minutes later it hit like a train. Its effects are potent and definitely uplighting, it's a sativa through and through, the high is pleasant but i wasn't expecting this kinda potency! don't make too many important plans while smoking this stuff... great strain...”

“This strain makes a beautiful lemony smoke that engulfs your face; it’s a great feeling. I enjoyed this a lot with a strong head kick. However a little later I had my first bout of mj related paranoia and dizziness. It is tempting to try it again but I’m leery of those negative side effects!”

“I'm a variety strain kind of gal, with an affinity for the cerebral uplifting effects and cognitive reframing effects of cannabis. This strain got me right away with increased energy and lift in depression in one good inhale. It came as a recommendation from the always helpful Jeremiah at Urban Greenhouse. Great staff, always helpful.”
“strain is very uplifting felt great after a couple hits.”

“let's eat eat eat eat eat. super chill strain but i get soooo hungry. it's okay though, i just have to have food on deck. even though it's labeled as a sativa it acts a lot like an indica. still a really enjoyable strain.”
“I used wax... and oh man, this is sweet! This strain puts me in a great mood, relaxed and kinda horny without giving me much munchies so it's an absolute win!”

“typically if I haven't seen it before I come to leafly before I purchase and I didnt Lemon Cake holds up to its name in flavor it was advertised as a indica hybrid which I could clearly tell it wasnt after my 3rd deep inhale and my head started to pound instead of sending a tingly calm comfort. I wont buy it again and I bought and used the product in disilite form. taste phenomenal though”

“Passed a deal on thcbd lemon cake for bubba diesel. Later grabbed an 8th of Rochester’s lemon cheesecake. It read 21.21% thc and .39% cbd. Looks are ok. Scraggly long fluffy sticky buds dull greens and dull orange hairs. Smell is amazingly good immediately picks my mood up from the scent. Aroma is strong ripe lemon citrus with a hint of skunk. Smoke is tasty lemon and a good brief cough. Euphoria immediately sets in,...”
“love this strain!! taste so good with a low temp dab!! great high less pain and stress free.”
“as i taste it now its every good and im in florida right now too”
“The best energetic high you will ever get with the up most uplift  after relaxation ... prob the best one out here rn 😀😀😀😀10/10”

“For all my occasional smokers out there: smoke a lil bit of this and you'll feel pretty sleezy. Smoke just a little too much and you might get dizzy. 

I don't know if it's just me but the first night I smoked this as a real small joint I was dizzy for about 20 mins before throwing up. But after that, I felt fine. smoked smaller portions after that.”

“This stuff makes me paranoid. I get sleepy just from feeling so stressed out. This reminds me of the stuff available to me in high school and back then I hated getting high because this high sucks. It's better than nothing though, I guess.”
